Text: Resized map saved. Do you want to load that save? Note: continuing this session will likely crash the game anyway.

There are objects outside of the map after you shrink it. Remove all those objects before shrinking to prevent crashing? (This action will only remove the objects; you need to come back here to resize again.)
Remember to save your game before resizing the map! This game session will likely not work anymore after resizing. You should also pause the game before using this.
